channel.title: How long have you been playing runescape?
channel.description: Hello there, Just a general question i thought I'd ask,"How long have you been playing runescape?" I've been playing runescape for around 4 years now and 2 years on servers and I'm still enjoying it, are you?

item.title: How long have you been playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’m not sure when I started; I played about 1-2 years before RS2 came out. Until about 2007

Read full topic
item.source: How long have you been playing runescape?

item.title: How long have you been playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:43, topic:266826”][quote author=cooper link=topic=352331.msg2711238#msg2711238 date=1237322732]

Started this year, the game’s mad tight.

… How can you have an account on an RS cheating site and not start until 3 years after?

Perhaps he was being sarcastic.

facepalm

I was being sarcastic “…”

Perhaps I was being sarcastic.
[/quote]

Being sarastic isn’t working for you.[/quote]
Perhaps I agree.

Read full topic

[/quote]

What did you think of runescape classic compared to the next version after it, i think allot of people still liked the classic.[/quote]

Yeah, I started playing in 2002 also. Classic was really fun, I liked it much better than RS2.
